definition.text: Let's test the first Layer in the Trading Engine Layer Manager: Episode Counters.

paragraphs.text: Turn the layer on and slide your mouse pointer over the chart, from the far left to the far right-hand side of your screen!

See what happens with the various counters on the hierarchy below... that is, Periods, Strategies, Positions, and so on! You should see something similar to what I show in the video on the next step...
